entry.title: love loves to love love
entry.content: 老婆

entry.title: love loves to love love
entry.content:
Love is a touch and not yet a touch.
For you, a thousand times over.
Love is the one thing that transcends time and space.
Shall I compare thee to a summer’s day?
Thou art more lovely and more temperate.
I love you once.I love you twice.I love you more than beans and rice.
课堂复习[em]e166[/em]：
I feel like my heart has been talking to you.
what lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies between us.
even if all th lights go out，you are still the brighter than the moonlit sky.
falling in love with you was the easiest thing I’ve ever done
the eyes of a lover are the eighth ocean.
time has only two uses， to waste and to love you.
eyes are loud.
I turned off the moon，but you are more dazzling than it.
mountains and rivers are far wide， human fireworks， none is you， none is not you.
my love for you shall in my verse ever live young.
may blooming flowers and lively crowds accompany you along the way.
your figure is everywhere my eyes and ears can reach.
my love for you is like a whale’s longing for the ocean, like a bird’s longing for the mountains.
your time belonging to me is too little.
when summer dies，all lotus will die for their love.
your ten thousand bright smiles make up my life.
three brief summers are better than fifty lonely years.
I look at the moon， but I only see you.
I am because you are.
always be with you.
you mean everything in my whole life.
mountains and rivers are far wide， human fireworks， none is you， none is not you.
i will choose you in all my choices.
your figure is everywhere my eyes and ears can reach.
love is an extremely precious accidental event.
Waiting for you.
you complete me.
to love Daddy is the beginning of a lifelong romance.

遗忘+失望
我的遗产是数字和文字的结合；
如果有这么一天，我已经意识不到我的存在，我已经在一股漩涡中不能脱身，我倘若接受不了现实，就像海边的曼彻斯特的主角一样，选择离开令我伤心的地方。
哎，世界什么的都毁灭吧
第一，没有把我当成自己人，尤其是对他态度和对我态度不一；
第二，
